name: interview-skill-assessment
description:
This is my interview skills assessment of React. 
Build a web app that display past events for this user ID "X8RVN508nc" using React JS. 
Use ReactJS, Parse Javascipt SDK, Parse Cloud code, with any front-end design framework, and Heroku deployment... 
1. Build a React app to display list of past events that this user has attended. 
2.Use Parse Javascript SDK to call getCheckin to get past events with a set userid param (refer to Parse cloud code doc). 
3. List event photo, event name, event date & time, total attendee count for event. 
4. Write necessary unit test cases. 
5. Deploy on Heroku.
author: Saul Lopez
